name: Still Ridge - Demo
description:
Deep in the Appalachians is a town you won't find on any map: Still Ridge. Omar Fletcher, a therapist who navigates the dreams of his troubled clients, is called to the town by someone close to him. As intense nightmares of the town's residents overwhelm Omar a serial killer from Still Ridge's past resurfaces.

---

Still Ridge demo was created for the Haunted PS1 Demo Disk 2021. The final game will be released commercially in four parts, each 90-120 minutes. The first part will release commercially Q4 2021. The demo is an early work-in-progress and does not represent the final quality of the finished product. 

Follow https://twitter.com/jaybee_tyn for development updates

Support the project on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/jaybeemadethis
